faqs.question: Is RERA applicable to all residential properties listed in mg road
faqs.answer: The Real Estate Regulatory Authority RERA laws apply primarily to new residential projects where the land size exceeds 500 square meters or more than eight apartments are planned. When purchasing a new construction flat, RERA ensures timely completion, quality construction, and secure handling of funds. However, RERA does not govern resale properties between two individuals. We strongly advise buyers of resale flats to conduct thorough legal due diligence to verify the property title and ensure all municipal dues are cleared.
